pages.title: Mandrake
pages.text: As if touched by a fey spirit, mandragoras are typically bright and cheerful optimists, ready to laugh, frolic and enjoy life and nature. They sprout from their less charming relatives, the mandrakes.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: By feeding a mandrake their favorite food, a magical honey cookie, they will sprout into a Mandragora. A Mandragora will take care of your garden, and her lovely singing voice might even grow crops.

pages.title: Magical Honey Comb
pages.text: A Magical Honey Cookie can be made from magical honey combs which can be obtained at a Summer Court's Bee Keep.

pages.title: Bee Keep
pages.text: Inspired by a building of Kelpie The Fox: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cs-nHCvrOpg

pages.title: Bee Keep
pages.text: The best honey of the Summer Court is kept at the Bee Keep. The Bee Keep is protected by several Bee Knights. The Sacred Honey Comb is kept in a glass display. The display can be broken by left clicking it rapidly so it will break, and the golden treasure is yours.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Sometimes harvest magic may prevent you from sumnmoning a Mandragora with a Honey Cookie, then try creating a Summoning Scroll.

pages.title: Summoning Ingredients
pages.text: $(br) - Summoning Scroll$(br) - Magical Honey Cookie$(br) - Mandrake$(br) - Autumn Tree Sapling$(br) - Note Block

pages.title: Changing Type
pages.text: You can use a Mandrake Seed to change the Type of the Mandragora.
